duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and maintain the company’s core engineering systems, including PDM/PLM, WMS, and DMS.
Enforce key engineering and configuration management processes, ensuring compliance with industry standards.
Interface with cross-functional teams to embed configuration management best practices into existing processes.
Oversee and update Configuration Management Process (CMP) documents to comply with industry changes.
Administer the company’s DMS and Infor XA ERP database, ensuring consistency and relevance of information.
Administer the company’s CCB, managing committed actions and completion dates.
Administer the company’s WMS, managing cross-functional workflows and workloads.
Maintain Company, Customer, and Industry process specification database, reviewing and releasing as required.
Maintain an organized, clean, and safe work area, adhering to quality practices.

education_certification.credential: Associates Degree minimum or 4-8 years related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience.
